instruction: Patient reported dizziness only during the first couple of weeks of therapy; symptom has now resolved. Patient relies on phone alarms for medication dosing reminders but sometimes ignores them when busy at work, indicating occasional missed or delayed doses.

attributes.narrative: The patient experienced dizziness only during the first couple of weeks of therapy, which has since resolved. They use phone alarms to remind them to take their medication but admit to sometimes ignoring the alerts when busy at work, leading to occasional missed or delayed doses.

instruction: Clinician advised the patient to set up a back-up reminder system—such as a pill organizer or another more attention-grabbing alert—to improve medication adherence when phone alarms are missed.

attributes.comment: Set up a back-up reminder system—such as using a pill organizer or another more attention-grabbing alert—to improve medication adherence when phone alarms are missed.
